alternativeNames: Duchassaing, Placide; Duchassaing de Fontbressin, Édouard Placide
comments: 'Édouard' in TL2  and Supp. and Mem. New York Bot. Gard., 19(3): 313 (1975) seems to be an error for 'Edmond'
source: According to Miquel Sophie (Source: Register of deaths, Archives Départementale de la Dordogne France) this author's first name is 'Edmond', born Moule, Guadeloupe,  01/12/1818, died Perigord 16/09/1873.
